variants.Description in input context: This variant causes a structural change in the protein, affecting its function.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HeLa cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: The localization and intensity of the protein were altered for the variant NM_004977.6:c.2738C>A.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein localization and intensity are within the expected range.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein localization or intensity significantly deviate from the expected range.
